details: Learn the fundamentals of Python programming and start building your own applications.

course_name: Web Development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
details: Master front-end web development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Dive into data analysis, machine learning, and data visualization with Python.
Get started with Java programming and build your first Java applications.

course_name: Full-Stack Web Development with Node.js and React
details: Become a full-stack web developer using Node.js and React for building dynamic web applications.
Learn the basics of machine learning and start building predictive models.
Understand the fundamentals of cybersecurity and protect digital assets.
